duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative customer service, handling billing questions, policy changes, and other customer inquiries.
Empower customers with insurance knowledge and identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling.
Deliver efficient problem resolution using technology and learning resources.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account related questions from internal and external customers.
Actively participate in process changes and innovation to support business practices.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four-year college degree preferred.
